definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
idol drama/drama series in which the actors are chosen for their preexisting popularity with young viewers
burden of having to maintain one's image as a pop idol

sentences.english: I couldn't believe I was speaking to the player I grew up idolising.
sentences.chinese: 我不敢相信我和梦想中的偶像在交谈。

sentences.english: He was and always will be an icon.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是也会永远是偶像。

sentences.english: Former President George W. Bush called Cronkite "an icon of American journalism."
sentences.chinese: 前总统布什称克朗凯特为“美国新闻业的偶像”。

sentences.english: Their advocacy about celebrity sometimes let youngsters become fans of so-called idols.
sentences.chinese: 他们的宣传有时会让年轻人陷入偶像崇拜之中。

sentences.english: Grand ceremony of an Asia recreational, the brightness raise of God force.
sentences.chinese: 一场亚洲娱乐的盛典，一次偶像力量的辉扬。

sentences.english: And how did we get the new icon of mass consumerism in his place?
sentences.chinese: 我们如何从他的身上找到大众消费主义的新偶像？

sentences.english: Lee currently has about 70 would-be idols under his wing.
sentences.chinese: 现在李的旗下大约有70名准偶像歌星。

sentences.english: He was a pagan … who worshiped idols .
sentences.chinese: 他以前是个拜偶像的异教徒。

sentences.english: Dozens of Spanish beauties clamoured to get close to their idol.
sentences.chinese: 无数的西班牙美女顿时尖叫，拥过去接近她们的偶像。

sentences.english: The faces of these idols were distorted and grotesque with violent expressions of anger and hatred.
sentences.chinese: 这些偶像各个面目狰狞，满是仇恨和愤怒。

sentences.english: She was Dan's favorite model, cherished confidante and dearest friend.
sentences.chinese: 她是丹最爱的偶像，珍视的红颜知己和挚友。

sentences.english: The Nobel committee called George Babbitt the popular hero of the American middle class.
sentences.chinese: 诺贝尔委员会称，主人公巴比特是中产阶级的偶像。

sentences.english: There are many reasons explaining such cases of idolatry.
sentences.chinese: 造成这种偶像崇拜的原因有根多。

sentences.english: Mr NXP, you'll remain as an idol for me to spit upon.
sentences.chinese: NXP先生，你将永远是我唾弃的偶像。

sentences.english: He Youzhi is the idol of several generations of Chinese readers of comic books.
sentences.chinese: 贺友直是中国几代连环画读者的偶像。

definition: bean vermicelli/mung bean starch noodles/Chinese vermicelli/cellophane noodles/CL:把[ba3]/fan (loanword)/enthusiast for sb or sth
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
(astronomy) giant star/(fig.) superstar (of opera, basketball etc)
to make one's first public performance (of an entertainer etc)/to start one's career
